name: Applejack
overview: Guide Apllejack through the various mazes, collecting cherries and avoiding the sour grapes as you go. Collecting goody in the centre of maze will freeze the sour grapes and allow the E.X.T.R.A. man to appear, along with bitter lemons who will both pursue you and destroy the apples. Shoot all nasties with your magic ball or by pushing a well timed apple on top of their heads. Above all, have fun!
